verbs.description: During [ARG1: a roundtable discussion] [V: convened] [ARGM-PNC: to scold California Governor Jerry Brown for not bowing to Trump 's immigration agenda] , the " president " let his true feelings show .
During a roundtable discussion convened to [V: scold] [ARG1: California Governor Jerry Brown] [ARG2: for not bowing to Trump 's immigration agenda] , the " president " let his true feelings show .

During a roundtable discussion convened to scold [ARG0: California Governor Jerry Brown] for [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: bowing] [ARG1: to Trump 's immigration agenda] , the " president " let his true feelings show .

[ARGM-TMP: During a roundtable discussion convened to scold California Governor Jerry Brown for not bowing to Trump 's immigration agenda] , [ARG0: the " president "] [V: let] [ARG1: his true feelings show] .
During a roundtable discussion convened to scold California Governor Jerry Brown for not bowing to Trump 's immigration agenda , the " president " let [ARG1: his true feelings] [V: show] .
